kv2.4:5.3: Arahā paraneyyo parapattiyo parapaccayo parapaṭibaddhabhū, na jānāti na passati sammūḷho asampajānoti?
kv2.4:6.1: Nanu arahā na paraneyyo na parapattiyo na parapaccayo na parapaṭibaddhabhū jānāti passati asammūḷho sampajānoti?
kv2.4:6.3: Hañci arahā na paraneyyo na parapattiyo na parapaccayo na parapaṭibaddhabhū, jānāti passati asammūḷho sampajāno, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.4:7.1: Atthi puthujjanassa paravitāraṇā, so ca paraneyyo parapattiyo parapaccayo parapaṭibaddhabhū, na jānāti na passati sammūḷho asampajānoti?
kv2.4:7.3: Atthi arahato paravitāraṇā, so ca paraneyyo parapattiyo parapaccayo parapaṭibaddhabhū, na jānāti na passati sammūḷho asampajānoti?
kv2.4:8.1: Atthi arahato paravitāraṇā, so ca na paraneyyo na parapattiyo na parapaccayo na parapaṭibaddhabhū, jānāti passati asammūḷho sampajānoti?
kv2.4:8.3: Atthi puthujjanassa paravitāraṇā, so ca na paraneyyo na parapattiyo na parapaccayo na parapaṭibaddhabhū, jānāti passati asammūḷho sampajānoti?
kv2.4:9.3: Atthi arahato satthari paravitāraṇā, dhamme paravitāraṇā, saṃghe paravitāraṇā, sikkhāya paravitāraṇā, pubbante paravitāraṇā, aparante paravitāraṇā, pubbantāparante paravitāraṇā, idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu paravitāraṇāti?
kv2.4:10.1: Natthi arahato satthari paravitāraṇā, dhamme paravitāraṇā … pe …
kv2.4:10.5: Hañci natthi arahato satthari paravitāraṇā, dhamme paravitāraṇā … pe …
kv2.4:10.7: idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu paravitāraṇā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.4:11.1: Atthi puthujjanassa paravitāraṇā, atthi tassa satthari paravitāraṇā, dhamme paravitāraṇā … pe …
kv2.4:11.5: Atthi arahato paravitāraṇā, atthi tassa satthari paravitāraṇā, dhamme paravitāraṇā … pe …
kv2.4:12.1: Atthi arahato paravitāraṇā, natthi tassa satthari paravitāraṇā, dhamme paravitāraṇā … pe …
kv2.4:12.5: Atthi puthujjanassa paravitāraṇā, natthi tassa satthari paravitāraṇā, dhamme paravitāraṇā … pe …
kv2.4:13.3: Nanu arahato rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṃkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammoti?
kv2.4:13.5: Hañci arahato rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṃkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.4:14.7: anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṃkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammaṃ … pe …
kv2.4:14.19: nanu arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho … pe …
kv2.4:14.23: Hañci arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.4:15.2: Sadhammakusalassa arahato atthi paravitāraṇā, paradhammakusalassa arahato natthi paravitāraṇāti.
kv2.4:17.1: Sadhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, atthi tassa paravitāraṇāti?
kv2.4:17.3: Paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, atthi tassa paravitāraṇāti?
kv2.4:18.17: sadhammakusalo arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho … pe …
kv2.4:18.21: Paradhammakusalo arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho … pe …
kv2.4:19.1: Paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, natthi tassa paravitāraṇāti?
kv2.4:19.3: Sadhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, natthi tassa paravitāraṇāti?
kv2.4:20.1: Paradhammakusalassa arahato doso pahīno, moho pahīno … pe …
kv2.4:20.15: paradhammakusalo arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho … pe …
kv2.4:20.19: Sadhammakusalo arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho … pe …
kv2.4:21.4: “jānatohaṃ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmi, no ajānato no apassato.
kv2.4:21.5: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jānato kiṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, ‘iti rūpaṃ’ … pe …
kv2.4:21.8: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hotī”ti.
kv2.4:22.4: “jānatohaṃ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmi, no ajānato no apassato.
kv2.4:22.5: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jānato kiṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti—
kv2.4:22.6: bhikkhave, jānato passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, ‘ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo’ti … pe …
kv2.4:22.10: ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti jānato passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti.
kv2.4:22.11: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hotī”ti.
kv2.4:23.4: “sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya;
kv2.4:23.5: sabbañca kho, bhikkhave, abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā”ti.
kv2.4:25.4: “yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvakassa virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—
kv2.4:25.5: ‘yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman’ti, saha dassanuppādā, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa tīṇi saṃyojanāni pahīyanti—
kv2.4:29.4: Nanu arahato itthipurisānaṃ nāmagottaṃ pare vitāreyyuṃ, maggāmaggaṃ pare vitāreyyuṃ, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṃ nāmaṃ pare vitāreyyunti?
kv2.4:29.6: Hañci arahato itthipurisānaṃ nāmagottaṃ pare vitāreyyuṃ, maggāmaggaṃ pare vitāreyyuṃ, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṃ nāmaṃ pare vitāreyyuṃ, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv2.4:30.1: Arahato itthipurisānaṃ nāmagottaṃ pare vitāreyyuṃ, maggāmaggaṃ pare vitāreyyuṃ, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṃ nāmaṃ pare vitāreyyunti, atthi arahato paravitāraṇāti?
kv2.4:30.3: Arahato sotāpattiphalaṃ vā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arahattaṃ vā pare vitāreyyunti?
